question.qText: What was most likely Luther’s main purpose in this document?

aBtn.aText: To show his intelligence in church matters
To warn the church that it is in danger of God’s wrath
To share his general thoughts on the state of the church
To admonish the pope for allowing ignorant and wicked priests to pray on the fear of the dying
To provide theological reasons why indulgences (especially the sale of such) go against church teachings
